main event: One disc-shaped UFO was observed off the coast of Okinawa on October 3, 1952 for ten seconds, moving at a tremendous rate of speed before seemingly disappearing into thin air.
interesting points: The UFO was described as blue-white and disc-shaped, displaying no sound or trail as it moved at high speeds.
The observation had both military and civilian sources, lending credibility to the report.
Photographs were taken of the UFO, but no physical evidence was found.
The conclusion suggested a possible astronomical explanation, specifically a meteor, due to the characteristics of the object.
There were no aircraft or balloons in the vicinity at the time of the observation.
